speaker: goldblum
text: Welcome everyone to our philosophical exploration of consciousness and existence!

speaker: owen
text: Yeah! Let's dive into the madness, shall we?

speaker: goldblum
text: You know, the concept of time has always... fascinated me. It's not linear, not really.

speaker: owen
text: Time? Mate, after decades on tour, time just... blurs together!

speaker: goldblum
text: But that's the beauty of it! The subjective nature, the way it bends and warps around experience.

speaker: owen
text: I'll tell you what warps time - a good riff and a sold-out crowd! That's when everything just stops.

speaker: goldblum
text: Exactly! Flow state, peak experience... we're talking about the same phenomenon from different angles.

speaker: owen
text: Maybe we're all just reflections in some cosmic mirror, you know?

speaker: goldblum
text: I couldn't have said it better myself. The universe experiencing itself through us.

speaker: owen
text: Cheers to that, mate! Now that's something worth pondering over a pint!
